body.p: The app directory contains the files that implement the 4D Pubs app in Angular. These include:

li.p:
App logic implemented as services. These include:
ConfigService -- loads config data into the app
ConrefService -- Expands conrefs inline in topics
ExtensionService -- implements arbitrary JS functions that can be called by ConrefService; the function results expand inline in a topic
SearchService -- implements in-brwser search
TocService -- builds the TOC out of a DITAMAP
TransformService -- Implements XSLT transforms
Javascript libraries, including Angular, jQuery, jQuery.Fancytree, and Stemmer
